name: Croon Callaghan Aviation Consulting LLP
goal: Croon Callaghan is an aviation consultancy specializing in legal and regulatory advice to airlines, primarily focussed on the EU market.  Our clients are both EU and global carriers.  In terms of reguatory matters, we have a product that assists airlines in dealing with EU261 on passenger compensation, which also includes a lobbying component seeking to have the regulation reformed to be more fair and balanced towards airlines.  We also represent clients in areas such as aircraft noise; slot matters; competition law (including state aid); M&A; etc.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Transport
euInitiatives: We are currently dealing with EU261 on passenger compensation in the aviation industry, including lobbying for reform of the regulation to bring more balance for airlines and also to ensure safety and financial stability.  We are also engaged on competition matters; slots; aircraft noise; state aid;and general advice to clients on EU regulatory matters.
